Title: Relates to certain time periods and prospective applicants in adoption proceedings; repealer
Summary: Changes the time period for extrajudicial consent; lengthens the time period for payments to a birth mother prior to giving birth; expands the types of unlawful denials of prospective applicants in adoption proceedings; repeals provisions relating to an individual's religious faith when determining placement.
LawCode: Amd §§110 & 115-b, Dom Rel L; rpld §373 sub 3, amd §§373, 374 & 382, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the social services law, in relation to certain time periods and prospective applicants in adoption proceedings; and to repeal subdivision 3 of section 373 of the social services law relating to adoption proceedings and an individual's religious faith
